name: One (itch) (Renhui)
description:
You just got off the train. Looking around a hazy and deserted environment trying to recall memories that are troubling you. 

This is a discontinued prototype from 2018 and the first game I created myself.
Originally I wanted to learn more about how to design and program certain mechanics. To create something with a start and end was my challenge. 

Most of the 'lines' are excerpts from my notebooks. 

Controls:

  • E for interaction
  • W A S D for walking
